tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE locations (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, latitude FLOAT, longitude FLOAT)

CREATE TABLE recommendation (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    recommendation_type VARCHAR(50),
    recommendation_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES location_data(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE restaurants (
    restaurant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    restaurant_name TEXT,
    location_id INT,
    cuisine_type TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name TEXT,
    location_id INT,
    activity_type TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Recommendations (
 tourist_id INT NOT NULL,
 restaurant_id INT NOT NULL,
 activity_id INT NOT NULL,
 recommendation_date DATE,
 PRIMARY KEY (tourist_id, restaurant_id, activity_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (tourist_id) REFERENCES Tourists(id),
 FOREIGN KEY (restaurant_id) REFERENCES Restaurants(id),
 FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES Activities(id)
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
  longitude DECIMAL(11, 8)
)

CREATE TABLE restaurants (
  restaurant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  location_id INT,
  cuisine VARCHAR(50),
  rating DECIMAL(2, 1)
)

CREATE TABLE activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  location_id INT,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  rating DECIMAL(2, 1),
  review_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE tourists (
  tourist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  age INT
)
